remarks: Same as ~ cdlemg17dN with fewer antecedents but longer proof TODO: fix comment.  (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdlemg12.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg12.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg12b.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg17dALTN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H /\ G e. T ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ Q e. A /\ P =/= Q ) /\ ( ( R ` G ) .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) /\ ( G ` P ) =/= P ) ) -> ( R ` G ) = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) ) $.
